data.text: @GovCanHealth I’ve had Covid-19 ten times now. Do I still need my booster shots?
@GovCanHealth China hide the truth and spread the virus since 2019
@GovCanHealth This has become an evangelistic movement full of placebo and powered by legacy media suggestive narratives. Why not build a church ?
@akpatel47 @GovCanHealth That’s exactly what they are doing. Sensible too, but sensibility is too much to ask from our government
@666GOD416 @DV007952 @GovCanHealth That’s for travelers where Canada accepts any vaccine that is WHO approved. Doesn’t mean it is approved by Health Canada
@ManuelVeth @GovCanHealth Isn’t that what they’re doing in Europe? Seems to be working there!

@ManuelVeth @GovCanHealth recently crossed the border to import my son’s car to the US. Once at US customs, we realized that a document was missing so we had to go back. At the Canadian side I was told that I needed a negative test to re-enter. I was in the US for 5 minutes. Beyond stupid.
@akpatel47 @GovCanHealth Here is what I would do, scrap it for those who are boosted. That’s a good incentive for people to get the shot, this way you just frustrate people.

@ManuelVeth @GovCanHealth Here in the states they’re still preaching “get vaccinated folks”. Uhhh listen joe. If they’re not vaccinated now they aren’t going to. Let’s just get back to life please. No travel restrictions!
